practice_phrases.target: I want to speak with you.

practice_phrases.known: 我很快就要开始说话了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start to speak soon.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我在说话。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I'm speaking.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我今天晚上要和别人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to speak with someone else this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我想尽可能多地和会说英语的人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I want to speak with people who speak English as often as possible.
